title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: The SaveAs functionality is not preserving the file type and the icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When I use the SaveAs feature, the file is saved with a generic file icon and the file type is not preserved. Additionally, when I open the saved file, it is treated as a text file instead of being recognized as the original file type.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file, and when the saved file is opened, it should be recognized as the original file type.
SR:
1. Open the parent java file.
2. Use the SaveAs feature to save the file with a different name.
3. Open the saved file and verify that it has the same extension as the original file and it is recognized as the original file type.
